txt.en: 'Strange sounds and strange creeping shadows surround us here... do you feel uneasy? I think it is coming from the north. There is a sickly light about that place.\n\n'I have noticed a great increase in the gredbyg about this place. Perhaps it is their hive up yonder... will you go and thin their numbers? I will rest easier if I know there are less of them to crawl over me in my sleep!'
'Ah! A fine effort, [placeholder]. Would that this were the end of them! But I suppose I will have to settle for this valiant endeavour of yours. You have my thanks!'
'Brrr! Those gredbyg do make me shiver!'
Thórhall is disturbed by the strange noises being emitted all around Lamab-dûm, and fears that the noise comes from the gredbyg that crawl all over.
Defeat gredbyg in the Palace of Náin ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
A swarm of gredbyg can likely be found in a hive in the Palance of Náin, north of Lamab-dûm in the Great Delving.\n\nThórhall wants you to kill off as many gredbyg as you can.
Thórhall is at his camp in Lamab-dûm in the Great Delving.\n\nYou should return to Thórhall and tell him that the grodbog presence is somewhat lessened in the hive to the north.
